thread.title: Deepika Padukone launches 'Bajirao Mastani's first song in Delhi
thread.title_full: Deepika Padukone launches 'Bajirao Mastani's first song in Delhi - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Deepika Padukone launches 'Bajirao Mastani's first song in Delhi
text: New Delhi, Oct 18 (ANI): Bollywood leggy lass Deepika Padukone , who is all set to mesmerise the audience with her warrior princess role in Sanjay Leela Bhansali's 'Bajirao Mastani,' launched the very first song of the movie titled 'Deewani Mastani' in the national capital. Speaking on Day One of the Blenders Pride Fashion Tour, the 'Piku' star told the media that she believes that there is a "mastani" in every woman. The 29-year-old actress also admitted that 'Deewani Mastani' is the grandest song she has ever done in her entire film career. The movie also stars Deepika's current boyfriend Ranveer Singh and Priyanka Chopra in the lead roles and is all set to hit the theatres on December 18, 2015. Â»
